00015 #define BOARD_WIDTH 80
00016 #define BOARD_HEIGHT 23
00017 
00018 #define NUM_SECONDS_TOTAL 15
00019 #define NUM_STEPS_SECOND 4
00020 #define NUM_STEPS_TOTAL NUM_SECONDS_TOTAL * NUM_STEPS_SECOND

00022 char Board[(BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT) + 1];
00023 char NextBoard[(BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT) + 1];
00024 
00025 uint8 running = 0;

00027 unsigned int cursor_tile = 0;

00029 void updateBlock(int i)
00030 {
00031         if (running)
00032         {
00033 
00034                 int numberNearMe = 0;
00035 
00036                 if (Board[i + 1] == '#')
00037                 {
00038                         numberNearMe++;
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 if (Board[i - 1] == '#')
00042                 {
00043                         numberNearMe++;
00044                 }
00045 
00046                 if (i - BOARD_WIDTH > 0)
00047                 {
00048                         if (Board[i - BOARD_WIDTH] == '#')
00049                         {
00050                                 numberNearMe++;
00051                         }
00052 
00053                         if (Board[i - BOARD_WIDTH - 1] == '#')
00054                         {
00055                                 numberNearMe++;
00056                         }
00057 
00058                         if (Board[i - BOARD_WIDTH + 1] == '#')
00059                         {
00060                                 numberNearMe++;
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 if (i + BOARD_WIDTH < BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT)
00065                 {
00066                         if (Board[i + BOARD_WIDTH] == '#')
00067                         {
00068                                 numberNearMe++;
00069                         }
00070 
00071                         if (Board[i + BOARD_WIDTH + 1] == '#')
00072                         {
00073                                 numberNearMe++;
00074                         }
00075 
00076                         if (Board[i + BOARD_WIDTH - 1] == '#')
00077                         {
00078                                 numberNearMe++;
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 if (Board[i] == ' ')
00083                 {
00084                         if (numberNearMe == 3)
00085                         {
00086                                 NextBoard[i] = '#';
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089                 else
00090                 {
00091                         if (numberNearMe < 2)
00092                         {
00093                                 NextBoard[i] = ' '; //KILL MEE
00094                         }
00095                         if (numberNearMe > 3)
00096                         {
00097                                 NextBoard[i] = ' ';
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 
00102 }

00104 void setupBoard()
00105 {
00106         int i = 0;
00107 
00108         for (i = 0; i < BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT; i++)
00109         {
00110 
00111                 Board[i] = ' ';
00112 
00113         }
00114 
00115         Board[23] = '#';
00116         Board[24] = '#';
00117         Board[103] = '#';
00118         Board[186] = '#';
00119         Board[186 + BOARD_WIDTH] = '#';
00120         Board[186 + BOARD_WIDTH - 1] = '#';
00121 
00122         Board[53] = '#';
00123         Board[132] = '#';
00124         Board[133] = '#';
00125         Board[134] = '#';
00126         Board[213] = '#';
00127 }

00129 void redraw()
00130 {
00131         cls();
00132         printf("GAME OF LIFE: State ");
00133 
00134         if (running) 
00135                 printf("running");
00136         else
00137                 printf("not running");
00138         printf("\n");
00139 
00140         unsigned int i = 0;
00141         for (i = 0; i < BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT; i++)
00142         {
00143 
00144                 if (!running)
00145                 {
00146 
00147                         if (i == cursor_tile)
00148                                 printf("@");
00149                         else
00150                                 printf("%c", Board[i]);
00151 
00152                 }
00153                 else
00154                 {
00155                         printf("%c", Board[i]);
00156                 }
00157         }
00158 
00159 }

00161 void updateLogic()
00162 {
00163         memcpy(NextBoard, Board, (BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT) + 1);
00164         
00165         unsigned int i = 0;
00166 
00167         for (i = 0; i < BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT; i++)
00168         {
00169                 updateBlock(i);
00170         }
00171 
00172         memcpy(Board, NextBoard, (BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT) + 1);
00173 }

00175 int cSleep = 0;
00176 
00184 int main(int argc, void* argv)
00185 {
00186         postboxSetFlags(INPUT_BIT);
00187 
00188         cursor_tile = 0;
00189 
00190         running = 0;
00191 
00192         setupBoard();
00193         Board[BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT] = '\0';
00194         redraw();
00195 
00196         for (;;)
00197         {
00198 
00199                 if (postboxHasNext() == 1)
00200                 {
00201                         process_message message;
00202                         message = postboxGetNext();
00203                         
00204                         if (message.ID == INPUT_MESSAGE)
00205                         {
00206                                 //Its a input message alright
00207                                 if (message.message_data[0] == DEVICE_KEYBOARD)
00208                                 {
00209                                         //its a keyboard message even!
00210                                         char C = getAsciFromScancode(message.message_data[1], message.message_data[2]);
00211 
00212                                         if (C == 'e')
00213                                         {       
00214                                                 exit(0);
00215                                         }
00216                                         else if (C == 'w')
00217                                         {
00218                                                 if (cursor_tile > BOARD_WIDTH)
00219                                                 {
00220                                                         cursor_tile -= BOARD_WIDTH;
00221                                                 }
00222                                         }
00223                                         else if (C == 's')
00224                                         {
00225                                                 if ((cursor_tile + BOARD_WIDTH) < (BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT))
00226                                                 {
00227                                                         cursor_tile += BOARD_WIDTH;
00228                                                 }
00229                                         }
00230                                         else if (C == 'a')
00231                                         {
00232                                                 if (cursor_tile > 0)
00233                                                 {
00234                                                         cursor_tile -= 1;
00235                                                 }
00236                                         }
00237                                         else if (C == 'd')
00238                                         {
00239                                                 if (cursor_tile < (BOARD_WIDTH * BOARD_HEIGHT) - 1)
00240                                                 {
00241                                                         cursor_tile += 1;
00242                                                 }
00243                                         }
00244                                         else if (C == 'r')
00245                                         {
00246                                                 if (running) running = 0;
00247                                                 else
00248                                                         running = 1;
00249                                         }
00250                                         else if (C == 'f')
00251                                         {
00252                                                 if (Board[cursor_tile] == ' ')
00253                                                 {
00254                                                         Board[cursor_tile] = '#'; 
00255                                                 }
00256                                                 else
00257                                                 {
00258                                                         Board[cursor_tile] = ' ';
00259                                                 }
00260                                         }
00261                                         redraw();
00262                                 }
00263                         }
00264                 }
00265 
00266 
00267                 cSleep++;
00268 
00269                 if (running)
00270                 {
00271                         updateLogic();
00272                         redraw();
00273                         sleepUnprecise(125);
00274                 }
00275 
00276         }
00277 
00278         return 1;
00279 }
